sentence.Network_en: I won't encroach on your time any longer.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不会再占用你的时间了。

sentence.Network_en: New housing is starting to encroach upon the surrounding fields.
sentence.Network_cn: 新住宅开始延伸到周围的田地.

sentence.Network_en: Any attempt to encroach upon presidential prerogatives in this domain was quickly and firmly resisted.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何试图挑战总统在这个领域的特权的举动都遭到了迅速而坚定的制止。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'obtain unlawfully, seize'; formerly also as incroach): from Old French encrochier 'seize, fasten upon', from en- 'in, on' + crochier (from croc 'hook', from Old Norse krókr)

entry.def: If one thing encroaches on another, the first thing spreads or becomes stronger, and slowly begins to restrict the power, range, or effectiveness of the second thing.

example.ex: Any attempt to encroach upon presidential prerogatives in this domain was quickly and firmly resisted...
example.tran: 任何试图挑战总统在这个领域的特权的举动都遭到了迅速而坚定的制止。

example.ex: The new institutions do not encroach on political power...
example.tran: 新机构没有侵犯到政治权力。

entry.def: If something encroaches on a place, it spreads and takes over more and more of that place.

example.ex: The rhododendrons encroached ever more on the twisting drive...
example.tran: 越来越多的杜鹃花长到了蜿蜒的车道上。

example.ex: I turned into the dirt road and followed it through encroaching trees and bushes.
example.tran: 我转上土路，在蔓延至路面的树木和灌木间穿行。

sentences.sentence: "This impinges on my rights as an individual"

auth_sentence.content: I shall not encroach upon your Time.
auth_sentence.res_content: I shall not encroach upon your Time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I shall not encroach upon your Time.

auth_sentence.content: Dense thickets of banana trees encroach the side of a road.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dense thickets of banana trees encroach the side of a road.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dense thickets of banana trees encroach the side of a road.

auth_sentence.content: Ministers must not encroach on others' portfolios, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ministers must not encroach on others' portfolios, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ministers must not encroach on others' portfolios, he said.

sentences.en: His new farm buildings encroached on his neighbour’s land.
sentences.cn: 他的新农场建筑侵占了邻居的土地。

means.word_mean: 妨碍(正常生活或活动等)

sentences.en: She tried to prevent her work from encroaching too far on her private life.
sentences.cn: 她尽力避免工作过多地影响她的私生活。

sentences.en: New housing is starting to encroach upon the surrounding fields.
sentences.cn: 新住宅开始延伸到周围的田地。
